original_title: Germany’s Bentlage looking to set up in Sri Lanka: BOI
original_body_lines: Germany’s world famous labelling solution company Bentlage President Christopher Hettlage and Director Hans Vonk Man met with the officials of the Board of Investment on Monday to discuss the modalities to set up an operation in Sri Lanka.

Internationally, Bentlage offers its customers a broad spectrum of services, from offset and screen printing, letterpress and flexographic printing to digital printing and modern processes such as in-mould labelling and doming.
